title: Calories in Chipotle Steak Bowl
meta_description: Learn calories in chipotle steak bowl with full nutrition facts, macros, protein, and tweaks for custom orders under 160 characters.
assumptions: Standard Chipotle burrito bowl: adobo-marinated steak, white rice, black beans, fajita veggies, tomato salsa, cheese, lettuce; no guac or sour cream.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by portion size, customizations, location, and preparation. Check Chipotle app or receipt for exact values.

quick_answer.text: A standard Chipotle steak bowl contains about 665 kcal and 45 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a Chipotle steak bowl without rice?
faqs.a: About 455 kcal if swapping rice for extra veggies.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a Chipotle steak bowl?
faqs.a: Approximately 45 g from steak, beans, and cheese.

faqs.q: Are Chipotle steak bowls high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 1500 mg due to seasoning and salsa.

faqs.q: Calories in Chipotle steak bowl with brown rice?
faqs.a: Similar to white rice, about 665 kcal; brown adds slightly more fiber.

faqs.q: How to make a lower-calorie Chipotle steak bowl?
faqs.a: Skip cheese and rice, add extra lettuce and veggies for ~400 kcal.
